name: GCP IAM user with service account privileges
description: Checks to ensure that IAM users don't have service account privileges. Adding any user as service account actor will enable these users to have service account privileges. Adding only authorized corporate IAM users as service account actors will make sure that your information is secure.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND api.name = 'gcloud-projects-get-iam-user' AND json.rule = '(roles[*] contains roles/iam.serviceAccountActor) or (roles[*] contains roles/iam.serviceAccountUser) or (roles[*] contains roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator)'
recommendation:
1. Login to GCP Portal
2. Go to IAM & Admin (Left Panel)
3. Select IAM 
4. From the list of users, identify the users with Service Account Actor, Service Account User or Service Account Token Creator roles
5. Remove these user roles by clicking on Delete icon for any unauthorized user
